titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue certificates of documentation for 6 dredging vessels.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4820.

bill.summary: 4/21/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for six named vessels for engaging in dredging.
